name: Path of Life
description:
Choose which side you will fight for.
The Light of Good or the Dark of Evil.
Fight on a quest to win the jewel.
The item that will determine who will rule all three realms.

Gameplay Features include:

Mouse/Game Controller support
Sideview battle
World Map
Mini maps
Character Selection (18 Choices) + good or evil
Side Quests
Difficulty Selection
Crafting
Equipment slot system like the Final Fantasy Materia system
Teleport system
Mini Games
Monster compendium
Stat distribution
Equipment Sets
Multiple Equipment Slots
System Options
